241:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścidibhyakule ślāghanīyavṛttacāritrasaṃpanne prārthanīyasaṃbandhe kulodbhavānāṃ nipānabhūte śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ kośakoṣṭhāgāranirviśeṣe mitrasvajanānāmabhigamanīye kṛpaṇavanīpakānāmupajīvye śilpijanasyāspadabhūte lakṣmyā dattānugrahasatkāre rājño lokābhisaṃmate janma pratilebhe|
241:4: sa kālānāmatyayenābhivṛddhaḥ kṛtaśramo lokābhimateṣu vidyāsthāneṣvaparokṣabuddhirvividhavikalpāśrayāsu kalāsu jananayanakāntena ca vapuṣā dharmāvirodhinyā ca lokajñatayā svajana iva lokasya hṛdayeṣu paryavartata|
241:5: na hi svajana ityeva svajano bahu manyate|
241:6: jano vā jana ityeva svajanād dṛśyate'nyathā||1||
241:11: sukhodayatvaṃ ca tapovanānāṃ na gehasaukhyeṣu manaḥ sasañje||3||
241:12: sa mātāpitroḥ kālakriyayā saṃvignahṛdayastamanekaśatasahasrasaṃkhyaṃ gṛhavibhavasāraṃ mitrasvajanakṛpaṇaśramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo yathārhamatisṛjya pravavrāja|
241:14: sa dhyānaguṇābhyāsāt sātmībhūtenākṛtakenendriyaprasādena śrutihṛdayāhlādinā ca vidvattāsūcakenānutsiktena vigatalābhāśākārpaṇyadainyena vinayaujasvinā yathārhamadhuropacārasauṣṭhavena dharmādharmavibhāganipuṇena ca vacasā pravrajitācāraśībharayā (ca)
241:16: kautūhalinā ca janena samupalabdhakulapravrajyākramaḥ suṣṭhutaraṃ lokasaṃmatastatrābhūt|
241:19: athāsya tatrābhigamanamupalabhya pitṛvayasyaḥ samabhigamya cainaṃ guṇabahumānāt kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ cāsmai nivedyātmānaṃ pitṛvayasyatāṃ ca saṃkathāprastāvāgatamenaṃ snehāduvāca-cāpalamiva khalvidamanuvartitaṃ bhadantenānapekṣya kulavaṃśamasmin vayasi pravrajatā|
241:20: ārādhyate satpratipattimadbhirdharmo yadāyaṃ bhavane vane vā|
241:21: śrīmanti hitvā bhavanānyatastvaṃ kasmādaraṇyeṣu matiṃ karoṣi||5||
241:24: mūrtaṃ daridratvamivopaguhya kathaṃ nu śokasya vaśaṃ prayāsi|
241:25: imāmavasthāṃ hi tavekṣamāṇā dviṣo'pi bāṣpāpihitekṣaṇāḥ syuḥ||7||
241:26: tadehi pitryaṃ bhavanaṃ tavedaṃ śrutārthasāraṃ bhavatāpi nūnam|
241:27: saṃpādayethā nivasaṃstvamatra dharmaṃ ca satputramanorathaṃ ca||8||
241:31: atha bodhisattvaḥ pravivekasukhāmṛtarasaparibhāvitamatistatpravaṇahṛdayaḥ samupalabdhaviśeṣo gṛhavanavāsayoḥ kāmopabhoganimantraṇāyāṃ tṛpta iva bhojanakathāyāmasukhāyamāna uvāca-
241:36: yatra nāma sukhaṃ naiva sadhanasyādhanasya vā|
241:38: yadapi ceṣṭaṃ gṛhasthenāpi śakyamayamārādhayituṃ dharma iti kāmamevametat|
241:44: yadi dharmamupaiti nāsti gehamatha gehābhimukhaḥ kuto'sya dharmaḥ|
241:46: iti dharmavirodhadūṣitatvād gṛhavāsaṃ ka ivātmavān bhajeta|
241:47: paribhūya sukhāśayā hi dharmaṃ niyamo nāsti sukhodayaprasiddhau||15||
241:48: niyataṃ ca yaśaḥparābhavaḥ syādanutāpo manasaśca durgatiśca|
241:50: api ca, sukho gṛhavāsa iti śraddhāgamyamidaṃ me pratibhāti|
241:53: sukhamatra kutaḥ kathaṃ kadā vā parikalpapraṇayaṃ na cedupaiti|
241:56: prāyaḥ samṛddhyā madameti gehe mānaṃ kulenāpi balena darpam|
241:57: duḥkhena roṣaṃ vyasanena dainyaṃ tasminkadā syātpraśamāvakāśaḥ||19||
241:64: adharmamiśraṃ tu sukhaṃ na kāmaye viṣeṇa saṃpṛktamivānnamātmavān||22||
241:65: ityavagamitamatiḥ sa tena pitṛvayasyo hṛdayagrāhakeṇa vacasā bahumānameva tasminmahāsattve satkāraprayogaviśeṣeṇa pravedayāmāsa|
